zimbra-zimlet-confidential-header.sensitivityDialog: Set sensitivity indication for this email
zimbra-zimlet-confidential-header.CompanyConfidential: Please treat this email as Confidential
zimbra-zimlet-confidential-header.Personal: Please treat this email as Personal
zimbra-zimlet-confidential-header.Private: Please treat this email as Private
zimbra-zimlet-confidential-header.sendFail: A failure occurred sending the message

zimlet.description: This Zimlet allows the user to add and view the Confidential/Sensitivity Header based on RFC2156
zimlet.label: Confidential/Sensitivity Header
